subject: Horse Racing
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: It was not just what Mine That Bird did in his workout, but how happily he did it that had jockey Calvin Borel predicting a victory in the Belmont Stakes on Saturday.
snippet: It was not just what Mine That Bird did in his workout, but how happily he did it that had jockey Calvin Borel predicting a victory in the Belmont Stakes on Saturday.
